name: Clownfish Aquarium
description:
This is the best clownfish app.
- You can grow a clownfish (it is famous as the hero of the movie) .
- You can know growth of clownfish in real time.
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should feed clownfish once every three days, and change the water only once a week.
clownfish is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of clownfish in your daily life!
